title: DFINITY
desc: The DFINITY Foundation is a major contributor to the Internet Computer.
about: The DFINITY Foundation is a not-for-profit organization developing technology for the Internet Computer blockchain. We are headquartered in Zürich, Switzerland, and have major research centers in Switzerland and California, and remote teams in places such as Germany, the UK and US. Our team of cryptographers, computer scientists and engineers have collectively earned nearly 100,000 academic citations. We aim to create a “blockchain singularity” in which every system and service is rebuilt and reimagined using smart contracts and runs entirely from infinite public blockchain without need for traditional IT.

title: Internet Computer Association
desc: The Internet Computer Association (ICA) is a Geneva-based independent members organization.
about: The Internet Computer is a public blockchain that hosts smart contracts that run at web speed, can serve web from cyberspace, run efficiently, and can scale within an environment that has unbounded capacity. Smart contracts are a profoundly new and superior form of tamperproof and unstoppable software. They can imbue systems and services with new properties, enabling the reimagination of websites, systems, internet services and finance.

title: Internet Identity
desc: Internet Identity is a smart contract implemented on the Internet Computer blockchain.
about: Internet Identity guarantees that your data isn’t visible, tracked, or mined. The blockchain authentication system enables users to sign in to dapps on the Internet Computer and sites across the web anonymously and securely.

title: Plug Wallet
desc: Plug Wallet, built and open sourced by Fleek, is a browser extension.
about: Plug is a browser extension that allows you to access your ICP, Cycles, and other tokens as well as log into IC apps with one click.

title: Stoic Wallet
desc: Stoic Wallet allows anyone to create a digital wallet.
about: Stoic Wallet by Toniq Labs allows anyone to create a digital wallet, authenticating users through a variety of methods, one of those being Internet Identity. Create accounts, keep an address book, and more.

title: IC Dashboard
desc: The Internet Computer Association (ICA) is a Geneva-based independent members organization.
about: The Internet Computer Association (ICA) is a Geneva-based independent members organization that advocates for the Internet Computer network while supporting and coordinating ecosystem participants.

title: Dfinity Explorer
desc: DFINITY Explorer is an open-source project under the MIT license, providing transparency, reliability, and security.
about: Our mission is to provide a bridge between you and the Internet Computer, allowing you to easily search for and retrieve information which is useful in a format that is understandable, with everything you want to know right at your fingertips. DFINITY once had a goal of building their foundation into a “NASA for decentralization”. There have in fact been 89 NASA “Explorer” missions since 1958, carrying a wide variety of scientific investigations. We want DFINITY Explorer to be the perfect vehicle to explore the Internet Computer universe.

title: ic.rocks
desc: IC.Rocks is a complete block explorer for the Internet Computer.
about: IC.Rocks is a complete block explorer for the Internet Computer – built by the community.racking everything from transactions, to network upgrades, to cycles, IC.Rocks enables anyone to explore the inner-workings of the Internet Computer.

title: ICP Scan
desc: The Internet Computer rocks. Analytics, explorer, and tools
about: The Internet Computer rocks. Analytics, explorer, and tools.

title: DSCVR
desc: A completely decentralized social content platform running on the #InternetComputer beta preview started!
about: At DSCVR (pronounced discover) which is currently in beta, our mission is to create a decentralized social content aggregation platform where users not only control the content, but also the platform itself. Think Reddit, if Reddit’s development was run by its most dedicated community members.

title: OpenChat
desc: Real-time messaging is now possible on a blockchain.
about: With the advent of the Internet Computer, real-time messaging is now possible on a blockchain.

title: ICME
desc: The Internet Computer's first no-code website builder.
about: ICME is a no-code tool that makes it easy for anyone to build and deploy beautiful websites on the Internet Computer. Launch your blog or business's website on the Internet Computer today.

title: Agryo
desc: Agryo is the global agricultural risk intelligence provider.
about: Agryo is the global risk intelligence provider that enables financial institutions to assess and manage financial risks in the crop field level for underwriting agriculture insurance, loans, and trade finance globally; as well as meet sustainability goals.

title: ORIGYN Foundation
desc: We are on a mission to identify, authenticate and unlock the powers of ownership for objects of value.
about: The Origyn Foundation is blending luxury goods, with NFTs by providing digital verifications for physical objects. Only possible on the Internet Computer.

title: Sailfish
desc: The gateway to open financial services on the Internet Computer.
about: Sailfish is bringing autonomous and open financial services to DFINITY. The composability of “money legos” and the scalability of the Internet Computer allow for unlimited new markets and opportunities.

title: Dfinance
desc: DFinance is building the open financial services infrastructure for the DFINITY Internet Computer.
about: DFinance is building the open financial services infrastructure for the DFINITY Internet Computer.

title: Dank
desc: Dank is the first Decentralized Bank built on the Internet Computer, developed by Fleek.
about: Dank is a collection Open Internet Services on the InternetComputer, including the Cycles Token (XTC) for holding & using cycles with just a Principal ID.

title: Tacen
desc: Building the next generation of crypto exchanges.
about: Protect your privacy with the hDEX.Trade freely with Tacen, the all new Legal-First Non-Custodial Exchange.

title: ICP Swap
desc: ICPSwap #DFINITY. The Hub of Future Decentralized Finance.
about: Reinventing the Exchange as a Hub that Provides Full-stack Financial, Market, and DAO Services on the Internet Computer

title: InfinitySwap
desc: A platform to create, stake and swap Dfinity Tokens.
about: InfinitySwap (ISWAP) adopts a deflationary system where the more ISWAP are used the more tokens are burned. It will have a Max-Supply of 100 Millions and it can be used to earn platform fees, pay for platform services and get access to Airdrops and other awesome features.

title: EnsoFinance
desc: Discover and create open DeFi metastrategies.
about: Create social metastrategies with batch asset purchasing, yield farming, liquidity mining, tolerance band rebalancing, restructuring, flash swaps, collateralization, and arbitrage.

title: Dfistarter
desc: DfiStarter is the first project accelerator for Dfinity.
about: The first project accelerator on Dfinity, DfiStarter brings crowdfunding, PR, marketing, and tech support services to the Dfinity ecosystem.

title: ICP Neuron Calculator
desc: Long time Internet Computer fan.
about: The Network Nervous System Calculator is a calculator that allows anyone to edit variables and estimate voting rewards based on number of proposals voted on, length of stake, accumulated maturity, and more.

title: Fleek
desc: Fleek brings decentralized web-hosting to the Internet Computer.
about: Fleek makes it easy to build websites and apps on the new open web: permissionless, trustless, censorship resistant, and free of centralized gatekeepers.

title: TONIQ LABS
desc: Building the future with blockchain
about: Fleek makes it easy to build websites and apps on the new open web: permissionless, trustless, censorship resistant, and free of centralized gatekeepers.

title: Sudograph
desc: Sudograph is a GraphQL database for the Internet Computer.
about: Sudograph is a GraphQL database for the Internet Computer. Its goal is to become the simplest way to develop applications for the IC. Developers start by DeFining a GraphQL schema using the GraphQL SDL.

title: ICPFans
desc: ICPFans is committed to building the most developer-friendly Dfinity Chinese technology community.
about: ICPFans is committed to promoting and popularizing Dfinity related technologies, cultivating Dfinity ecological developers, and helping to build better Internet computers.

title: ICP League
desc: ICP League is a non profit organization.
about: ICP League is a non profit organization that aims to serve #DFINITY developers and enthusiasts.

title: Dfinity SZ
desc: DfinitySZ is the leading Dfinity Chinese community in China.
about: The Dfinity Shenzhen（China) community focuses on Dfinity ecological technology development and high-quality projects based on Dfinity.

title: ICPSquad
desc: The Extraordinary Community Behind The Internet Computer.
about: Dfinity Community is an initiative that has been established by Dukakis Tejada, an experienced Crypto marketer and community builder, in order to support the Internet Computer’s vision of reinventing the internet.

title: DeckDeckGo
desc: DeckDeckGo is a web open source editor for presentations.
about:
It works on any devices (desktop, mobile or tablets), without any prior installation, and even makes your content editable in full screen mode.
Unlike other presentation software, your slides are published as online applications, making them the fastest way to be shared.

title: IC Drive
desc: A decentralized private file storage dapp built on the Internet Computer.
about: A decentralized private storage app built on the Internet Computer. Store and securely share any type from anywhere in the world with this decentralized version of Box, or Google Drive.

title: DFINITY SCAN
desc: The Internet Computer is a public blockchain network .
about: The Internet Computer is a public blockchain network so powerful that it can natively host hyperscale open internet services, pan-industry platforms, DeFi systems, secure enterprise systems, websites, and all of humanity's software logic and data in smart contracts. It is created by independent data centers worldwide running the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP).

title: Canistore
desc: Simplify the storing, selling, and sharing of your photos, music, and videos… forever!
about:
Imagine being able to create and share content without worrying about the latest algorithm changes that affect your viewings, followings and ratings.
Imagine feeling safe in the knowledge that your content is secure on the Internet Computer and cannot be removed by monopolized companies. 
As a decentralized media service provider, built on revolutionary technology and using the advanced computer science of @DFINITY ∞ Canistore aims to eliminate these platform risks by developing a next-gen social-store mobile application, that will be governed and owned by its community.

title: Aedile
desc: Aedile is the first open project management service hosted on the Dfinity Internet Computer.
about: Aedile is the first open project management service hosted on the Dfinity Internet Computer. The idea is to offer teams and individuals a decentralized alternative to their favorite Tools in order to bring agility to the cyberspace ! Aedile is 'Trello meets Jira with a DAO twist'.

title: Distrikt
desc: Distrikt is a completely decentralized, community-owned professional network.
about: Distrikt is a decentralized, professional social media network that empowers users to own and control their identity.

title: Rise of the Magni
desc: It is a game that is experienced through story mode adventure.
about: Buy, earn, and trade collectibles, compete in tactical battles online to earn in-game tokens, and venture through story mode to experience one of the first games built on the Internet Computer.

title: Welcome Into the Metaverse
desc: This game brings digital community into a unified virtual space.
about: Find anecdotes from founding ecosystem members, and go through a series of quests.

title: HexGL
desc: HexGL is a futuristic racing game .
about: HexGL is a futuristic racing game using HTML5, Javascript, WebGL and hosted on the Internet Computer blockchain in order to run instantly on your browser from anywhere in the world.
